newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine cash maize steady, export demand.
newsitem.headline: Argentine cash maize steady, export demand.

text.p: Argentine cash maize closed steady in tight trade at the Buenos Aires Cereals Exchange supported by a return of export demand Thursday, traders said.

FAS elevator maize was at $98 for delivery to Buenos Aires. Today's easier Chicago ensured that local soybean prices did not rise much to take account of rises in international prices Wednesday, when Argentine markets were closed. FAS elevator soybeas for spot delivery to Rosario were unchanged at $265, in low volume. Cash sunflower seed was steady at $217 in Rosario, with demand muted.
